definition: spendthrift/wastrel/prodigal
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: My teacher arranged me homework and asked me to make a bargain with a stranger who looks like a black sheep.
sentences.chinese: 老師給我佈置了一個作業，讓我和看起來像敗家子。

sentences.english: Peter is a black sheep of his family. He sold his house for drinking.
sentences.chinese: 皮特真是個敗家子，賣了房子換酒錢。

sentences.english: I suppose every family has a black sheep .
sentences.chinese: 我想，每個家庭恐怕都有個敗家子。

sentences.english: Tom is the black sheep of his family.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆是個敗家子香港電影大全。

sentences.english: He is the black sheep of her family.
A spendthrift will allow a few people to monopolize her attention.
sentences.chinese: 阿敗家子將允許少數人壟斷了她的注意。

sentences.english: Dick is a black sheep, always bringing trouble to his family.
sentences.chinese: 迪克是個敗家子，總給家裏招惹麻煩。

sentences.english: A black sheep never worries about the difficulty of earning money.
sentences.chinese: 一個敗家子從來不會爲賺錢的辛苦而擔心。

sentences.english: Returned home to mother complained, zhang zhang mother called Yang ink green the black sheep of his family.
sentences.chinese: 回到家向張母報怨，張母大罵楊墨青敗家子。

sentences.english: A spendthrift does not like being a spendthrift.
sentences.chinese: 揮霍無度的人也不喜歡成爲敗家子。

sentences.english: Eric is a black sheep ,splashing one million dollars in a few years .
sentences.chinese: 艾瑞克是個敗家子，幾年就揮霍了一百萬美金。

sentences.english: Is Amazon (AMZN) really a reckless spender?
sentences.chinese: 亞馬遜真的是個敗家子嗎？

sentences.english: Jack was a black sheep and was driven out of his home.
sentences.chinese: 傑克是個敗家子，被逐出了家門。

sentences.english: They say every family has its black nerf.
sentences.chinese: 據說，每個家族都會出敗家子。

sentences.english: Eric is a black sheep, splashing one million dollars in a few years.
sentences.chinese: 艾瑞克是個敗家子，幾年就華侈了一百萬美金。

sentences.english: Liming is the black sheep of his family.

definition: to think for oneself and act accordingly (idiom); to act on one's own initiative
evil conduct
to plot and kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money
harmful teachings/evil doctrine
lit. lively dragon and animated tiger (idiom)/fig. vigorous and lively
lit. trifling destroys the will (idiom); infatuation with fine details prevents one making progress/excessive attention to trivia saps the will
having wealth equivalent to that of an entire nation (idiom)/extremely wealthy
to die by violence
scramble for power and profit (idiom); power struggle
to incite trouble/to stir up havoc
lit. to order people by pointing the chin (idiom); to signal orders by facial gesture/arrogant and bossy
argot/bandits' secret jargon/malicious words
without learning or skills (idiom); ignorant and incompetent
to bewail one's poverty/to complain about being hard up/to pretend to be poor
to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
richly bedecked/dripping with gold and silver (idiom)
